A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is painfully OK. Not terrible. Not great. There is no arc to the movie\, and the entire story is bloated. 

The writing desperately needed an editor - clunky dialogue and about 30-45 minutes too long. The entire master code breaker plot is a waste of time. And the rest of the movie is about running out of gas. 

Rose is a wasted\, poorly acted character & her romance with Finn was forced.

Every time the movie almost made an interesting or bold turn\, they backed off - any character growth\, Rey's battle with the dark side\, Rey's parents\, Kylo's struggle\, etc.

There were some awesome sequences thanks to CGI\, but hopefully E9 is written better.
